::Prowl/Firearm/Cledar/Forrior/Blyer/Rixer::

Prowl, Firearm, Cledar, Forrior, Blyer, and Rixer stand in attention, 
listening to what Iron Raptor said. They were all glad that the 
Maximals were finally having some military structure. This could 
really help them in the war. Prowl's thoughts clearly showed his 
aproval.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked at the Maximals assembled ahead of her, 
crossing her 
> arms.*
> 
> " The last battle was a hard one, and it's wearing us out."
> 
> * She walked towards them a little more.*
> 
> " Battle after battle. Most of us are finding it harder and harder 
to try 
> and get enough time in just to feed ourselves."
> 
> * Iron looked down at the ground as she walked, then looking up as 
soon as 
> she was only 6ft away from the bots in the first row.*
> 
> " But there's no breaks from that strain yet, I'm afraid.  We're 
getting 
> weaker, losing our edge. Even that Alliance can kick our asses and 
that's 
> bad."
> 
> * She took a breath.*
> 
> " And I'm not saying it's our fighting that needs working on because 
it's 
> not.  Even as Arkness Prime I'd find myself with a challenge just 
going up 
> against some of you.  It's our form, our coperation.
> We need stratagy, and we need attack plans.  And I know it's MY 
fault for 
> not doing that to begin with."
> 
> * She uncrossed her arms.*
> 
> " And now it's all of YOU who's paying for my poor leadership.  But 
I wanna 
> make it up to all of you."
> 
> * Iron cleared her throat.*
> 
> " For the next few mega-cycles we're going to drill.  And I'll be 
drilling 
> right along with you all.  After all, this is a war, not a vacation.  
But 
> while we ALL work our asses off I'll be getting something ready that 
I'm 
> sure you'll all enjoy."
> 
>
